_realtime.extensions.name: extensions
_realtime.extensions.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _realtime.extensions (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    type text,
    settings jsonb,
    tenant_external_id text,
    inserted_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    updated_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL
);

_realtime.schema_migrations.name: schema_migrations
_realtime.schema_migrations.comment: Auth: Manages updates to the auth system.

_realtime.tenants.name: tenants
_realtime.tenants.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _realtime.tenants (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    name text,
    external_id text,
    jwt_secret text,
    max_concurrent_users integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 200,
    inserted_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    updated_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    max_events_per_second integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 100,
    postgres_cdc_default text DEFAULT 'postgres_cdc_rls'::text,
    max_bytes_per_second integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 100000,
    max_channels_per_client integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 100,
    max_joins_per_second integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 500,
    suspend boolean DEFAULT false,
    jwt_jwks jsonb,
    notify_private_alpha boolean DEFAULT false,
    private_only boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false
);

auth.audit_log_entries.name: audit_log_entries
auth.audit_log_entries.comment: Auth: Audit trail for user actions.

auth.flow_state.name: flow_state
auth.flow_state.sql:
-- stores metadata for pkce logins
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.flow_state (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    user_id uuid,
    auth_code text NOT NULL,
    code_challenge_method USER-DEFINED NOT NULL,
    code_challenge text NOT NULL,
    provider_type text NOT NULL,
    provider_access_token text,
    provider_refresh_token text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    authentication_method text NOT NULL,
    auth_code_issued_at timestamp with time zone,
    CONSTRAINT flow_state_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.flow_state IS 'stores metadata for pkce logins';

auth.identities.name: identities
auth.identities.comment: Auth: Stores identities associated to a user.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Auth: Email is a generated column that references the optional email property in the identity_data

auth.identities.sql:
-- Auth: Stores identities associated to a user.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.identities (
    provider_id text NOT NULL,
    user_id uuid NOT NULL,
    identity_data jsonb NOT NULL,
    provider text NOT NULL,
    last_sign_in_at timestamp with time zone,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    email text,
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    CONSTRAINT identities_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT identities_provider_id_provider_unique UNIQUE (provider),
    CONSTRAINT identities_provider_id_provider_unique UNIQUE (provider_id),
    CONSTRAINT identities_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.identities IS 'Auth: Stores identities associated to a user.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN auth.identities.email IS 'Auth: Email is a generated column that references the optional email property in the identity_data';

auth.instances.name: instances
auth.instances.comment: Auth: Manages users across multiple sites.

auth.mfa_amr_claims.name: mfa_amr_claims
auth.mfa_amr_claims.comment: auth: stores authenticator method reference claims for multi factor authentication
auth.mfa_amr_claims.sql:
-- auth: stores authenticator method reference claims for multi factor authentication
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.mfa_amr_claims (
    session_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    authentication_method text NOT NULL,
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT amr_id_pk PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_amr_claims_session_id_authentication_method_pkey UNIQUE (authentication_method),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_amr_claims_session_id_authentication_method_pkey UNIQUE (session_id),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_amr_claims_session_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.mfa_amr_claims IS 'auth: stores authenticator method reference claims for multi factor authentication';

auth.mfa_challenges.name: mfa_challenges
auth.mfa_challenges.comment: auth: stores metadata about challenge requests made
auth.mfa_challenges.sql:
-- auth: stores metadata about challenge requests made
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.mfa_challenges (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    factor_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    verified_at timestamp with time zone,
    ip_address inet NOT NULL,
    otp_code text,
    web_authn_session_data jsonb,
    CONSTRAINT mfa_challenges_auth_factor_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (factor_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_challenges_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.mfa_challenges IS 'auth: stores metadata about challenge requests made';

auth.mfa_factors.name: mfa_factors
auth.mfa_factors.sql:
-- auth: stores metadata about factors
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.mfa_factors (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    user_id uuid NOT NULL,
    friendly_name text,
    factor_type USER-DEFINED NOT NULL,
    status USER-DEFINED NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    secret text,
    phone text,
    last_challenged_at timestamp with time zone,
    web_authn_credential jsonb,
    web_authn_aaguid uuid,
    CONSTRAINT mfa_factors_last_challenged_at_key UNIQUE (last_challenged_at),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_factors_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT mfa_factors_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.mfa_factors IS 'auth: stores metadata about factors';

auth.one_time_tokens.name: one_time_tokens
auth.one_time_tokens.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.one_time_tokens (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    user_id uuid NOT NULL,
    token_type USER-DEFINED NOT NULL,
    token_hash text NOT NULL,
    relates_to text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT one_time_tokens_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT one_time_tokens_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

auth.refresh_tokens.name: refresh_tokens
auth.refresh_tokens.comment: Auth: Store of tokens used to refresh JWT tokens once they expire.
auth.refresh_tokens.sql:
-- Auth: Store of tokens used to refresh JWT tokens once they expire.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.refresh_tokens (
    instance_id uuid,
    id bigint(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('auth.refresh_tokens_id_seq'::regclass),
    token character varying(255),
    user_id character varying(255),
    revoked boolean,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    parent character varying(255),
    session_id uuid,
    CONSTRAINT refresh_tokens_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT refresh_tokens_session_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (session_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT refresh_tokens_token_unique UNIQUE (token)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.refresh_tokens IS 'Auth: Store of tokens used to refresh JWT tokens once they expire.';

auth.saml_providers.name: saml_providers
auth.saml_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SAML Identity Provider connections.
auth.saml_providers.sql:
-- Auth: Manages SAML Identity Provider connections.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.saml_providers (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    sso_provider_id uuid NOT NULL,
    entity_id text NOT NULL,
    metadata_xml text NOT NULL,
    metadata_url text,
    attribute_mapping jsonb,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    name_id_format text,
    CONSTRAINT saml_providers_entity_id_key UNIQUE (entity_id),
    CONSTRAINT saml_providers_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT saml_providers_sso_provider_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (sso_provider_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.saml_providers IS 'Auth: Manages SAML Identity Provider connections.';

auth.saml_relay_states.name: saml_relay_states
auth.saml_relay_states.comment: Auth: Contains SAML Relay State information for each Service Provider initiated login.
auth.saml_relay_states.sql:
-- Auth: Contains SAML Relay State information for each Service Provider initiated login.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.saml_relay_states (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    sso_provider_id uuid NOT NULL,
    request_id text NOT NULL,
    for_email text,
    redirect_to text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    flow_state_id uuid,
    CONSTRAINT saml_relay_states_flow_state_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (flow_state_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT saml_relay_states_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT saml_relay_states_sso_provider_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (sso_provider_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.saml_relay_states IS 'Auth: Contains SAML Relay State information for each Service Provider initiated login.';

auth.schema_migrations.name: schema_migrations
auth.schema_migrations.comment: Auth: Manages updates to the auth system.

auth.sessions.name: sessions
auth.sessions.comment: Auth: Stores session data associated to a user.

columns.name: not_after
columns.comment: Auth: Not after is a nullable column that contains a timestamp after which the session should be regarded as expired.

auth.sessions.sql:
-- Auth: Stores session data associated to a user.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.sessions (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    user_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    factor_id uuid,
    aal USER-DEFINED,
    not_after timestamp with time zone,
    refreshed_at timestamp without time zone,
    user_agent text,
    ip inet,
    tag text,
    CONSTRAINT sessions_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT sessions_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.sessions IS 'Auth: Stores session data associated to a user.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN auth.sessions.not_after IS 'Auth: Not after is a nullable column that contains a timestamp after which the session should be regarded as expired.';

auth.sso_domains.name: sso_domains
auth.sso_domains.comment: Auth: Manages SSO email address domain mapping to an SSO Identity Provider.
auth.sso_domains.sql:
-- Auth: Manages SSO email address domain mapping to an SSO Identity Provider.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.sso_domains (
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    sso_provider_id uuid NOT NULL,
    domain text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    CONSTRAINT sso_domains_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT sso_domains_sso_provider_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (sso_provider_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.sso_domains IS 'Auth: Manages SSO email address domain mapping to an SSO Identity Provider.';

auth.sso_providers.name: sso_providers
auth.sso_providers.comment: Auth: Manages SSO identity provider information; see saml_providers for SAML.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: Auth: Uniquely identifies a SSO provider according to a user-chosen resource ID (case insensitive), useful in infrastructure as code.

auth.users.name: users
auth.users.comment: Auth: Stores user login data within a secure schema.

columns.name: is_sso_user
columns.comment: Auth: Set this column to true when the account comes from SSO. These accounts can have duplicate emails.

auth.users.sql:
-- Auth: Stores user login data within a secure schema.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.users (
    instance_id uuid,
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    aud character varying(255),
    role character varying(255),
    email character varying(255),
    encrypted_password character varying(255),
    email_confirmed_at timestamp with time zone,
    invited_at timestamp with time zone,
    confirmation_token character varying(255),
    confirmation_sent_at timestamp with time zone,
    recovery_token character varying(255),
    recovery_sent_at timestamp with time zone,
    email_change_token_new character varying(255),
    email_change character varying(255),
    email_change_sent_at timestamp with time zone,
    last_sign_in_at timestamp with time zone,
    raw_app_meta_data jsonb,
    raw_user_meta_data jsonb,
    is_super_admin boolean,
    created_at timestamp with time zone,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone,
    phone text DEFAULT NULL::character varying,
    phone_confirmed_at timestamp with time zone,
    phone_change text DEFAULT ''::character varying,
    phone_change_token character varying(255) DEFAULT ''::character varying,
    phone_change_sent_at timestamp with time zone,
    confirmed_at timestamp with time zone,
    email_change_token_current character varying(255) DEFAULT ''::character varying,
    email_change_confirm_status smallint(16) DEFAULT 0,
    banned_until timestamp with time zone,
    reauthentication_token character varying(255) DEFAULT ''::character varying,
    reauthentication_sent_at timestamp with time zone,
    is_sso_user boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
    deleted_at timestamp with time zone,
    is_anonymous boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
    CONSTRAINT users_phone_key UNIQUE (phone),
    CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE auth.users IS 'Auth: Stores user login data within a secure schema.';
COMMENT ON COLUMN auth.users.is_sso_user IS 'Auth: Set this column to true when the account comes from SSO. These accounts can have duplicate emails.';

net._http_response.name: _http_response
net._http_response.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS net._http_response (
    id bigint(64),
    status_code integer(32),
    content_type text,
    headers jsonb,
    content text,
    timed_out boolean,
    error_msg text,
    created timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now()
);

net.http_request_queue.name: http_request_queue
net.http_request_queue.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS net.http_request_queue (
    id bigint(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('net.http_request_queue_id_seq'::regclass),
    method text NOT NULL,
    url text NOT NULL,
    headers jsonb NOT NULL,
    body bytea,
    timeout_milliseconds integer(32) NOT NULL
);

public.approval_routes.name: approval_routes
public.approval_routes.comment: Approval routes configured per invoice type.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the approval route.

columns.name: invoice_type_id
columns.comment: Invoice type (public.invoice_types.id) this route applies to.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the approval route.

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: TRUE when the route can be used for new payments.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the route record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the route record was last updated.

public.approval_steps.name: approval_steps
public.approval_steps.comment: Audit log of actions performed during payment approval.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the approval step entry.

columns.name: payment_approval_id
columns.comment: Payment approval instance (public.payment_approvals.id) this entry belongs to.

columns.name: stage_id
columns.comment: Workflow stage (public.workflow_stages.id) where the action happened.

columns.name: action
columns.comment: Recorded action on the stage, e.g. approve or reject.

columns.name: acted_by
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who performed the action.

columns.name: acted_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the action was performed.

columns.name: comment
columns.comment: Optional free-form note left by the approver.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the audit entry was stored.

public.attachments.name: attachments
public.attachments.comment: Metadata for files uploaded to Supabase Storage.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the attachment and Storage object identifier.

columns.name: original_name
columns.comment: Original filename provided by the user.

columns.name: storage_path
columns.comment: Path to the object inside Supabase Storage.

columns.name: size_bytes
columns.comment: File size in bytes.

columns.name: mime_type
columns.comment: Detected MIME type of the file.

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who uploaded the file.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the attachment record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the attachment metadata was last updated.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: User-provided description of the file content

public.contract_attachments.name: contract_attachments
public.contract_attachments.sql:
-- Связь договоров с приложенными файлами
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.contract_attachments (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    contract_id uuid NOT NULL,
    attachment_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT contract_attachments_attachment_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attachment_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT contract_attachments_contract_id_attachment_id_key UNIQUE (attachment_id),
    CONSTRAINT contract_attachments_contract_id_attachment_id_key UNIQUE (contract_id),
    CONSTRAINT contract_attachments_contract_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT contract_attachments_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.contract_attachments IS 'Связь договоров с приложенными файлами';

public.contract_invoices.name: contract_invoices
public.contract_invoices.sql:
-- Связь договоров со счетами
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.contract_invoices (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
    contract_id uuid NOT NULL,
    invoice_id uuid NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT contract_invoices_contract_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT contract_invoices_contract_id_invoice_id_key UNIQUE (contract_id),
    CONSTRAINT contract_invoices_contract_id_invoice_id_key UNIQUE (invoice_id),
    CONSTRAINT contract_invoices_invoice_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (invoice_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT contract_invoices_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.contract_invoices IS 'Связь договоров со счетами';

public.contractor_types.name: contractor_types

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the contractor type.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code used to identify the contractor type.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Human readable contractor type name.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional explanation of when to use the contractor type.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor type was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor type was last updated.

public.contractors.name: contractors
public.contractors.comment: Registry of contractors linked to invoices and projects.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the contractor.

columns.name: type_id
columns.comment: Contractor type (public.contractor_types.id).

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Official contractor name stored for invoices.

columns.name: inn
columns.comment: Russian tax identifier (INN) of the contractor.

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who created the contractor record.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the contractor record was last updated.

public.contracts.name: contracts

columns.name: contract_number
columns.comment: Номер договора

columns.name: contract_date
columns.comment: Дата заключения договора

columns.name: payer_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на плательщика (public.contractors.id)

columns.name: supplier_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на поставщика (public.contractors.id)

columns.name: vat_rate
columns.comment: Ставка НДС в процентах

columns.name: warranty_period_days
columns.comment: Гарантийный срок в днях

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Описание договора

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Пользователь, создавший запись (auth.users.id)

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на проект (public.projects.id)

public.departments.name: departments
public.departments.sql:
-- Организационные отделы компании
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.departments (
    id integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('departments_id_seq'::regclass),
    name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    description text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT departments_name_key UNIQUE (name),
    CONSTRAINT departments_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.departments IS 'Организационные отделы компании';

public.employees.name: employees

columns.name: last_name
columns.comment: Фамилия сотрудника

columns.name: first_name
columns.comment: Имя сотрудника

columns.name: middle_name
columns.comment: Отчество сотрудника

columns.name: full_name
columns.comment: Полное ФИО сотрудника (генерируется автоматически)

columns.name: department_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на отдел (public.departments.id)

columns.name: position_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на должность (public.positions.id)

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Рабочий email сотрудника

columns.name: phone
columns.comment: Рабочий телефон сотрудника

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Активен ли сотрудник (false = уволен)

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Пользователь, создавший запись (auth.users.id)

public.invoice_attachments.name: invoice_attachments

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the invoice-attachment relation.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.comment: Invoice (public.invoices.id) that the file belongs to.

columns.name: attachment_id
columns.comment: Attachment (public.attachments.id) linked to the invoice.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the attachment was linked to the invoice.

public.invoice_payments.name: invoice_payments

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the invoice-payment allocation.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.comment: Invoice (public.invoices.id) receiving the allocation.

columns.name: payment_id
columns.comment: Payment (public.payments.id) allocated to the invoice.

columns.name: allocated_amount
columns.comment: Portion of the payment applied to the invoice.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the allocation was recorded.

public.invoice_statuses.name: invoice_statuses
public.invoice_statuses.comment: Reference list of invoice workflow statuses.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the invoice status.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique status code used in API and UI.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the invoice status.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description clarifying when to use the status.

columns.name: sort_order
columns.comment: Ordering weight used when listing statuses.

columns.name: color
columns.comment: Optional UI color token or hex code for the status.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice status was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice status was last updated.

public.invoice_types.name: invoice_types
public.invoice_types.comment: Reference list of invoice classification types.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the invoice type.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code representing the invoice type.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the invoice type.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional explanation of what the invoice type represents.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice type record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice type record was last updated.

public.invoices.name: invoices

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the invoice (UUID).

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: Supabase auth user who created or owns the invoice.

columns.name: invoice_number
columns.comment: Human readable invoice number shown to customers.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional invoice description or customer note.

columns.name: due_date
columns.comment: Date by which payment is expected.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the invoice record was last updated.

columns.name: invoice_date
columns.comment: Calendar date printed on the invoice.

columns.name: payer_id
columns.comment: Contractor acting as payer (public.contractors.id).

columns.name: supplier_id
columns.comment: Contractor acting as supplier (public.contractors.id).

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Project associated with the invoice (public.projects.id).

columns.name: invoice_type_id
columns.comment: Invoice type reference (public.invoice_types.id).

columns.name: amount_with_vat
columns.comment: Invoice total amount including VAT.

columns.name: vat_rate
columns.comment: VAT rate applied to the invoice total, in percent.

columns.name: vat_amount
columns.comment: VAT portion of the invoice total.

columns.name: amount_without_vat
columns.comment: Invoice amount excluding VAT.

columns.name: delivery_days
columns.comment: Number of days required for delivery after payment.

columns.name: delivery_days_type
columns.comment: Interpretation of delivery days (working or calendar).

columns.name: preliminary_delivery_date
columns.comment: Projected delivery date calculated from payment terms.

columns.name: status_id
columns.comment: Workflow status of the invoice (public.invoice_statuses.id).

columns.name: delivery_cost
columns.comment: Стоимость доставки в рублях

columns.name: relevance_date
columns.comment: Дата актуальности счета. Автоматически устанавливается при создании и может обновляться пользователем

columns.name: material_request_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на заявку на материалы

public.material_classes.name: material_classes
public.material_classes.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.material_classes (
    id bigint(64) NOT NULL,
    code text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    is_active boolean DEFAULT true,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT material_classes_code_key UNIQUE (code),
    CONSTRAINT material_classes_name_key UNIQUE (name),
    CONSTRAINT material_classes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

public.material_request_items.name: material_request_items

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Уникальный идентификатор позиции

columns.name: material_request_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на заявку

columns.name: material_name
columns.comment: Наименование материала

columns.name: unit
columns.comment: Единица измерения (шт, кг, м, м2, м3, л и т.д.)

columns.name: quantity
columns.comment: Количество

columns.name: sort_order
columns.comment: Порядок сортировки позиций

public.material_requests.name: material_requests

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Уникальный идентификатор заявки

columns.name: request_number
columns.comment: Номер заявки

columns.name: request_date
columns.comment: Дата создания заявки

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Ссылка на проект

columns.name: employee_id
columns.comment: Ответственный сотрудник

columns.name: total_items
columns.comment: Общее количество позиций в заявке

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: Пользователь, создавший заявку

public.payment_approvals.name: payment_approvals

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the payment approval.

columns.name: payment_id
columns.comment: Payment (public.payments.id) that is being approved.

columns.name: route_id
columns.comment: Approval route (public.approval_routes.id) used for the payment.

columns.name: status_id
columns.comment: Current status of the approval (public.payment_statuses.id).

columns.name: current_stage_index
columns.comment: Zero-based index of the current stage within the route.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the approval instance was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the approval instance was last updated.

public.payment_attachments.name: payment_attachments

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the payment-attachment relation.

columns.name: payment_id
columns.comment: Payment (public.payments.id) that the file is attached to.

columns.name: attachment_id
columns.comment: Attachment (public.attachments.id) linked to the payment.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the attachment was linked to the payment.

public.payment_statuses.name: payment_statuses

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the payment status.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code identifying the payment status.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the payment status.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description of what the payment status means.

columns.name: sort_order
columns.comment: Ordering weight used when listing payment statuses.

columns.name: color
columns.comment: Optional UI color token or hex code for the payment status.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment status was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment status was last updated.

public.payment_types.name: payment_types
public.payment_types.comment: Reference list of payment types (advance, final, etc.).

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the payment type.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique code used to reference the payment type.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the payment type.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description of how the payment type is used.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment type record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment type record was last updated.

public.payments.name: payments
public.payments.comment: Payments registered against invoices in PayHub.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the payment (UUID).

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.comment: Invoice (public.invoices.id) that the payment relates to.

columns.name: payment_number
columns.comment: Unique sequential number of the payment.

columns.name: payment_date
columns.comment: Date on which the payment was made.

columns.name: amount
columns.comment: Monetary amount of the payment.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description or purpose of the payment.

columns.name: payment_type_id
columns.comment: Payment type (public.payment_types.id).

columns.name: status_id
columns.comment: Current payment status (public.payment_statuses.id).

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who created the payment record.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the payment record was last updated.

public.positions.name: positions
public.positions.sql:
-- Должности сотрудников
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.positions (
    id integer(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('positions_id_seq'::regclass),
    name character varying(255) NOT NULL,
    description text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT positions_name_key UNIQUE (name),
    CONSTRAINT positions_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE public.positions IS 'Должности сотрудников';

public.projects.name: projects
public.projects.comment: Projects used to group invoices and contractors.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the project.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Optional unique project code used in integrations and search.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the project.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional project description for internal users.

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: TRUE when the project is active.

columns.name: created_by
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who created the project.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the project record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the project record was last updated.

public.roles.name: roles
public.roles.comment: Roles that define access levels inside PayHub.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the role.

columns.name: code
columns.comment: Unique machine-readable code of the role.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the role.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Optional description of the role permissions.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the role record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the role record was last updated.

columns.name: own_projects_only
columns.comment: TRUE when the role limits users to their own projects.

public.user_profiles.name: user_profiles
public.user_profiles.comment: Mirror of Supabase auth user profiles stored in the public schema.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the profile and foreign key to auth.users.id.

columns.name: email
columns.comment: Primary email address associated with the user profile.

columns.name: full_name
columns.comment: Display name of the user.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the profile record was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the profile record was last updated.

columns.name: role_id
columns.comment: Role (public.roles.id) assigned to the user.

public.user_projects.name: user_projects
public.user_projects.comment: Mapping table assigning users to projects for access control.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the user-project link.

columns.name: user_id
columns.comment: User (auth.users.id) who receives access to the project.

columns.name: project_id
columns.comment: Project (public.projects.id) granted to the user.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the user-project link was created.

public.workflow_stages.name: workflow_stages
public.workflow_stages.comment: Workflow stages that build approval routes and set payment statuses.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Primary key of the workflow stage.

columns.name: route_id
columns.comment: Approval route (public.approval_routes.id) the stage belongs to.

columns.name: order_index
columns.comment: Zero-based order of the stage within the route.

columns.name: role_id
columns.comment: Role (public.roles.id) responsible for processing the stage.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Display name of the workflow stage.

columns.name: created_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the workflow stage was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.comment: Timestamp when the workflow stage was last updated.

columns.name: payment_status_id
columns.comment: Payment status (public.payment_statuses.id) applied after the stage is completed.

columns.name: permissions
columns.comment: JSON object storing stage-specific permissions like can_edit_invoice, can_add_files, can_edit_amount, etc.

columns.name: is_active
columns.comment: Soft deletion flag to preserve referential integrity with approval_steps table

realtime.messages.name: messages
realtime.messages.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS realtime.messages (
    topic text NOT NULL,
    extension text NOT NULL,
    payload jsonb,
    event text,
    private boolean DEFAULT false,
    updated_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    inserted_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    CONSTRAINT messages_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT messages_pkey PRIMARY KEY (inserted_at)
);

realtime.schema_migrations.name: schema_migrations
realtime.schema_migrations.comment: Auth: Manages updates to the auth system.

realtime.subscription.name: subscription
realtime.subscription.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS realtime.subscription (
    id bigint(64) NOT NULL,
    subscription_id uuid NOT NULL,
    entity regclass NOT NULL,
    filters ARRAY NOT NULL DEFAULT '{}'::realtime.user_defined_filter[],
    claims jsonb NOT NULL,
    claims_role regrole NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT timezone('utc'::text, now()),
    CONSTRAINT pk_subscription PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.buckets.name: buckets

columns.name: owner
columns.comment: Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead

storage.buckets.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.buckets (
    id text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    owner uuid,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    public boolean DEFAULT false,
    avif_autodetection boolean DEFAULT false,
    file_size_limit bigint(64),
    allowed_mime_types ARRAY,
    owner_id text,
    type USER-DEFINED NOT NULL DEFAULT 'STANDARD'::storage.buckettype,
    CONSTRAINT buckets_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN storage.buckets.owner IS 'Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead';

storage.buckets_analytics.name: buckets_analytics
storage.buckets_analytics.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.buckets_analytics (
    id text NOT NULL,
    type USER-DEFINED NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ANALYTICS'::storage.buckettype,
    format text NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ICEBERG'::text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT buckets_analytics_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.iceberg_namespaces.name: iceberg_namespaces
storage.iceberg_namespaces.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.iceberg_namespaces (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    bucket_id text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT iceberg_namespaces_bucket_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT iceberg_namespaces_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.iceberg_tables.name: iceberg_tables
storage.iceberg_tables.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.iceberg_tables (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    namespace_id uuid NOT NULL,
    bucket_id text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    location text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT iceberg_tables_bucket_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT iceberg_tables_namespace_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (namespace_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT iceberg_tables_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.migrations.name: migrations
storage.migrations.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.migrations (
    id integer(32) NOT NULL,
    name character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    hash character varying(40) NOT NULL,
    executed_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT migrations_name_key UNIQUE (name),
    CONSTRAINT migrations_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.objects.name: objects

columns.name: owner
columns.comment: Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead

storage.objects.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.objects (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    bucket_id text,
    name text,
    owner uuid,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    last_accessed_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    metadata jsonb,
    path_tokens ARRAY,
    version text,
    owner_id text,
    user_metadata jsonb,
    level integer(32),
    CONSTRAINT objects_bucketId_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT objects_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);
COMMENT ON COLUMN storage.objects.owner IS 'Field is deprecated, use owner_id instead';

storage.prefixes.name: prefixes
storage.prefixes.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.prefixes (
    bucket_id text NOT NULL,
    name text NOT NULL,
    level integer(32) NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT prefixes_bucketId_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT prefixes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (bucket_id),
    CONSTRAINT prefixes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (level),
    CONSTRAINT prefixes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (name)
);

storage.s3_multipart_uploads.name: s3_multipart_uploads
storage.s3_multipart_uploads.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.s3_multipart_uploads (
    id text NOT NULL,
    in_progress_size bigint(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    upload_signature text NOT NULL,
    bucket_id text NOT NULL,
    key text NOT NULL,
    version text NOT NULL,
    owner_id text,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    user_metadata jsonb,
    CONSTRAINT s3_multipart_uploads_bucket_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT s3_multipart_uploads_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

storage.s3_multipart_uploads_parts.name: s3_multipart_uploads_parts
storage.s3_multipart_uploads_parts.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS storage.s3_multipart_uploads_parts (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    upload_id text NOT NULL,
    size bigint(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    part_number integer(32) NOT NULL,
    bucket_id text NOT NULL,
    key text NOT NULL,
    etag text NOT NULL,
    owner_id text,
    version text NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
    CONSTRAINT s3_multipart_uploads_parts_bucket_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (bucket_id) REFERENCES None.None(None),
    CONSTRAINT s3_multipart_uploads_parts_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id),
    CONSTRAINT s3_multipart_uploads_parts_upload_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (upload_id) REFERENCES None.None(None)
);

supabase_functions.hooks.name: hooks
supabase_functions.hooks.comment: Supabase Functions Hooks: Audit trail for triggered hooks.

supabase_functions.migrations.name: migrations

vault.secrets.name: secrets
vault.secrets.comment: Table with encrypted `secret` column for storing sensitive information on disk.
vault.secrets.sql:
-- Table with encrypted `secret` column for storing sensitive information on disk.
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vault.secrets (
    id uuid NOT NULL DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name text,
    description text NOT NULL DEFAULT ''::text,
    secret text NOT NULL,
    key_id uuid,
    nonce bytea DEFAULT vault._crypto_aead_det_noncegen(),
    created_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT secrets_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

COMMENT ON TABLE vault.secrets IS 'Table with encrypted `secret` column for storing sensitive information on disk.';
